changelog.details: Separe the dialog to a component, this is needed for dinamically add it to the DOM
If there is not space to the right of the screen the color picker is open to the left
Fixing bug close on click anywhere
Fixing bug with panel position
Change to use of overlay for detect clickout
The panel now follows the caller when scrolling or resizing windows
Only changes produced within the panel emit change event
Remove of the tripled emit of event change when the picker is dragged
Now the panel is open inside the overlay element
Now the panel can be attached to other elements using the directive ngx-colors-trigger
Fixed a bug where changing the color using the color-picker slider changed the color shown in the slider too.
Now animation can be set again using colorsAnimation property
Removing unnecesary conversions
Implements Angular ControlValueAccessor, now we can use ngModel and formGroup
Updating to Angular 10
Allow set a custom palette using the property "palette"
Fixed a bug where sometimes the change event would fire before the value was updated
Forced output format
Fix stuttering when dragging sliders on touch screen devices
Add input event
Add property hideTextInput
Add property hideColorPicker
Change text from 'Aceptar' to 'Accept' in the color picker
Add property to set the text of the 'Accept' Button
Null values are now allowed and represented with a red line on the trigger.
Preview colors now have a background for transparent colors
8-Digit Hex colors on custom palette no longer break the panel selection.
Alignment of the + button
update to angular 12
Unable to close panel with just clicking outside using a custom trigger. Fixed now.
The + icon was changed since it brought confusion about its behavior
New property 'colorPickerControls' allows to hide the opacity slider (non-alpha) or only allow to modify the opacity (only-alpha)
Badge showing the selected custom color on the 'more'(colorpicker) button
New Property 'position' indicates if the dialog should be opened up (top) or down (bottom)
Property 'position' indicates if the dialog should start opened above (top) or below (bottom) the trigger, this is overridden if there is no space in that position
Now the panel moves above or below the trigger depending on whether there is space or not
Fixing errors when the selected color was null
Disabled property is now working
Color picker sliders do not changes value until the user clicks on accept button
New event 'slider' to indicate when hue,alpha or Lightness sliders are moved
set a custom class name for overlay using the property 'overlayClassName'
Indicate to which element the overlay is attached using the property 'attachTo'
Fix error when ACCEPT button was pressed in custom color selector before change any value on sliders or picker
Fix error when ACCEPT button was pressed in custom color selector before change any value on sliders or picker and the value is undefined or null
Removing all data:image/png;base64 images for security reasons.
Fix accidental close of the panel when click inside but draging outside the panel
Trigger not updating when value es changed from outside
Error that prevents the color picker from opening when color value was not a valid (hex,rgb,hsl) color
Update to angular 13
Improve responsiveness
#63 Fixed, Manual hex value on color picker panel reseting to default after accept
Allow undefined as a color for the custom palette
fixing disabled styles not reverting when reenabled
